page.title: 14NORMID SUPERMARKET LEEK
page.content: June 1st 1984 a huge new supermarket, Normid of Leek was opened.The land was cleared of factories and shops including an old cobblers."Normid" comes from North Midlands Co-operative and replaced the old store on the High Street. Many people poured through the doors the day it was opened,not many bought anything but simply walked around to see what it was like.I think the man who designed the building should be thanked for making our town a better place.It has got electric doors and moving floors to the car park.It has brought many people into the town and therefor it is bringing money into Leek.
